## setDepthPrePassStencil() function

Sets up all the needed stencil logic needed for the depth pre-pass.

This logic is in place to avoid z-fighting artifacts that can appear in geometries that have coplanar triangles inside the same mesh.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setDepthPrePassStencil(depthMesh: THREE.Mesh, colorMesh: THREE.Mesh): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  depthMesh | THREE.Mesh | Mesh created by <code>createDepthPrePassMesh</code>. |
|  colorMesh | THREE.Mesh | Original mesh. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
